__e: You know, all this time, I've been feeling sorry for you 'cause you didn't know your father, but after seeing how you took care of Earl... I feel sorry for your father that he didn't know you.
At least he took care of him while you were away, like I did, during the ten years you were away the first time.
Nevertheless, the fact remains... that others, not you, have taken care of the boy since he was an infant.
He looked after me for a couple months when I was 16, and now he thinks he owns me for life.
She took care of me, made me feel like I belonged to a family the first real one I ever had.
.. happening or what he wants out of me, or anything like that. But he took care of me.
I'm just a guy trying to get some justice for a woman who cared for you and all these other kids in here...
How can you say that to me when I'm the one that took care of you.
What to do when the parent who took care of you... can no longer take care of themselves?
He looked after me for a couple months when I was 16, and now he thinks he owns me for life.
.. happening or what he wants out of me, or anything like that. But he took care of me.
She took care of me, made me feel like I belonged to a family the first real one I ever had.
You've been groomed to take that company over, and now you're telling me you want to leave?
You took care of my child and my home, And you were there for my husband when he needed you.
But you don't know that this man didn't even care for his life... to help us reach here
She knew you were never gonna leave your wife. So she took care of it for you.
I was going to say White House counsel would like a moment but I guess he took care of that.
But it looks like Father Time took care of that for us, right?
I leave this earth with no doubt you've taken good care of your mother and brother the past couple of years.
Seems like he's taken good care of you, too.
Everyone's saying she was a bad mother, but she always took good care of me.
Oh, he was my favorite dead rat that this bastard took and threw in the trash!
Seems like he's taken good care of you, too.
Everyone's saying she was a bad mother, but she always took good care of me.
I acquired it some years ago from a family who had held it in trust for over a century and a half.
I saw the way you looked at him, the way you were with him.
All these years you've been tending it like a child getting it ready for the great day!
